text: Denis Grgic (born 19 September 1991) is a German footballer who plays as a goalkeeper. == Career == In February 2018, Grgic signed for Bulgarian First League club Etar Veliko Tarnovo. He was released at the end of the season. == References == == External links == * * Denis Grgic at fupa.net Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:German people of Croatian descent Category:German footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:SSV Ulm 1846 players Category:SSV Reutlingen 05 players Category:SFC Etar Veliko Tarnovo players Category:German expatriate footballers Category:German expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria
title: Denis Grgic
